title: Whispers of Fate
description: In the bestselling tradition of Laura Griffin, this second book in a new romantic suspense trilogy features a dog trainer who stumbles upon a clue to a cold case that has haunted her since childhood—and leads her to team up with a handsome sheriff.Christina, Tavey, and Raquel have been haunted for decades by the death of their best childhood friend—a crime that remains unsolved. Decades later, all three are still anchored in their small hometown of Fate, Georgia, and obsessed with discovering what happened to their friend so many years ago…Tavey Marcheaux is a dog trainer extraordinaire. She runs her own little shop in the historic section of town, but her background is in bloodhounds, a family business going back generations. She trains tracking dogs for police departments around the country. On one of her daily walks in the countryside, her dog finds a clue pointing to one of the town’s long-time suspects in a cold case linked to her childhood.She goes to confront the suspect once again, only to meet up with the new sheriff, the town’s one-time bad boy, and her first and only love, Tyler Downs. And as they search for Tavey’s missing friend, the two discover more than they ever imagined…
author: Deirdre Dore
